column4: i use facebook and it tells me i need upgrade adobe flash player.,  i all ready have javascript and it is enable and I have flash player non free and utube is not working eiter  what can i do
are you using 64bit ubuntu?
i dont know how do i find out'
in a terminal, uname -r   paste output
not showing anything but says `uname --help' for more information
uname -r   if you got that output, you entered it wrong
this is what i get when i put in uname -r    2.6.24-19-generic
make that uname -a
so now put in uname -a
did you see to use uname -a not uname -r
yes..
2.6.24-19-generic #1 SMP Fri Jul 11 23:41:49 UTC 2008 i686 GNU/Linux
ok, so you're using 32bit
how have you tried installing flash?
when i go to www.adobe flash player and hit download and install   it downloads
not sure how to get it to insall
go here., and in the drop down menu, choose "tar.gz for Linux".. and download it...   http://www.adobe.com/shockwave/download/download.cgi?P1_Prod_Version=ShockwaveFlash&promoid=BUIGP
ok it is download
extract it..  easiest place, is just put it inside home
ok done
open a terminal
put that in the terminal it say  No such file or directory
type this w/o quotes.. "/join #indygunfreak"
